Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES ENERGY HEALING CATEGORY SYMBOL.png

Description: Reiki is an ancient Japanese form of energy healing where the practitioner channelizes Chi energy from the Universal Life Force through their hands to a person, place, event, relationship or even a long-distance occurrence. Reiki is also used for chakra healing, chakra balancing, healing chronic ailments, removing energetic blocks and cleansing the auric field. This extra energy infused with the astral body kick-starts the innate ability of the body to heal itself, rejuvenates the flow of Chi and clears emotional blocks.

Pranic Healing This is an ancient yogic practice where one uses prana(cosmic energy)to heal various ailments in the body by contributing pure prana to the vital body. Pranic healing is used to balance and heal chakras, which aid in healing old emotional and karmic energetic blocks. It facilitates the smooth flow of prana in the vital body, which in turn heals the physical and emotional body.

Theta Healing occurs in a deep meditative state that generates theta brain waves. These theta brain wave states are used to establish a strong connection with the soul on a higher vibrational level to facilitate healing. With this discovery, using the concept of seven planes of existence, one can connect to the Creator of All That Is. One can view the limiting beliefs from a higher perspective, replace them with changed positive beliefs and thereby, see miraculous healings for oneself as well as others.

Crystal Healing or Therapy is a form of vibrational medicine that involves using the high-energy consciousness of crystals to facilitate healing. Crystals have healing vibrations that heal the receiver balancing their chakras and aura as they are a part of earth consciousness and very much alive.

Access Bars are 32 points on one’s head which when gently touched, release anything that doesn’t allow one to receive. These points have the storage of all the thoughts, beliefs, ideas, and emotions that one has stored in any lifetime. Each Access Bar session is capable of releasing 5-10 thousand years of limitations corresponding with the specific bar being touched. This is a nurturing and relaxing process where one can let go of any barriers and be willing to change in all aspects of one’s life.

Sujok Therapy originated in Onnuri Medicine and is a system of treatment comprising of techniques that prevent and cure illnesses and restore health without any drugs. The basis of Sujok Therapy healing is the discovery of self-regulation of the energy system of the human body whereby each hand, foot and other locations are connected to and carry information of each organ. The hands and feet structurally correspond to micro points that can be used most effectively as remote controls to treat any diseased organ/part of the body.

Shaktipath is transmitted by an enlightened master to a disciple by a mantra, touch or look at the third eye chakra that awakens the dormant energy of the cosmic life force known as Kundalini, within the receiver.

Kundalini is the divine cosmic force which is located at the base of the spine. Once activated, it can unlock spiritual siddhis and can also help one achieve enlightenment. It can be activated by spiritual masters and clears the Chakras when it flows in channels called Nadis. It results in clarity of thoughts and improved memory apart from giving relief from physical ailments.

DNA Activation is the awakening of human consciousness that is expressed within the unlocking of the human DNA to its hidden full potential. There are still many undiscovered mysteries within each human being. In this new consciousness, the planet has shifted into awakening and there are many who are making this shift through a re-connection with their I Am presence. One can work with the DNA and give instructions to it so that each strand can be fully activated, and the person can embrace their full potential as creators.

Holographic Healing of ancestral DNA is vibrational healing at the cutting edge. The techniques take you to your deepest self, where your ancestral stories are stored. As you discover the beliefs and feelings of your past, you will have the key to the present and clearly see the driving force behind your thoughts and emotions creating your life today. These techniques enable you with tools to assist you in the holographic repair and replacement of many genes like those for depression, fear, obesity, aging, anger, phobia and so on.

Applied Kinesiology is also the study of biomechanics (body movement), and is also now known as a method of ‘muscle strength testing’. Applied Kinesiology is based on the belief that muscles are linked to specific organs and glands, and their weakness indicates problems such as nerve damage, low blood supply, chemical imbalance and other neurological issues. Practitioners diagnose and treat this by correcting the muscle weakness that corresponds to the internal organs. Treatments can range from testing and counseling coupled with deep massage, joint manipulation, acupuncture and dietary therapies.

Vastu Shastra is an ancient Indian science of architecture that creates flow of energy in a home, office or any other setting. Vastu experts use the knowledge and study of five elements, four directions, nature, magnetic energy fields and gravity to help people streamline and determine how it affects all aspects of their life such as health, wealth, abundance and prosperity.

Feng Shui is an ancient Chinese study of the flow of Chi energy. It examines how the arrangement and placement of objects within a space affects the energy flow in the environment and how these objects interact with and also influence the flow of one’s personal energy. This influences how one thinks and behaves which in turn influences every area of one’s personal and professional life.

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES ENERGY HEALING-PRANA VIOLET HEALING.png
Description: Prana Violet Healing is a simple Energy healing technique where healing is done using the Prana Healing Wand (a Divine Tool used to sense Energy and to Heal – all participants will be given a Wand). You can heal yourself, heal others ans also do distant healing for anyone who may be present anywhere in this world. Healing is done following the Universal Divine Law of Karma which is also known as the Law of Action and Reaction. Prana Violet Healing helps one understand the root cause of suffering or disease and then heal it in a systematic way.

Psychic Surgery is practiced with bare hands and no surgical instruments by expert healers. These healers are able to use the understanding of Chi energy to enter the body using their bare hands and remove diseased and/or dead tissues, tumors, energy blockages, calcium deposits and other manifested physical matter that doesn’t need to be there. This method instantly and miraculously heals the recipient without inflicting any pain or even leaving a scar on their body.

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES ENERGY HEALING-MAGNIFIED HEALING PHASE.png
Description: Magnified Healing Phase is a holistic approach to healing the body naturally. The practitioner combines healing energy with voice and movement. It establishes a constant flow of energy from the heart to the Source, the All That Is, through all of the spiritual centers down to the diamond at the center of the Earth. The practitioner places one hand in front of the body and the other at the back of the client who is receiving the healing. The energy goes from one hand to the other through the body of the client leading to healing on the physical, emotional, mental and spiritual levels.

Preeti Siddhi is the divine power that exists within each human being. However, everyone cannot access it as it is clouded by the ego mind. One can only access it by allowing oneself the freedom of ’being’ and this enables the divine love and compassion to just overflow thereby assisting humans in healing their own bodies, minds and spirit. It is a ‘Siddhi’ (Spiritual Power) of ‘Preeti’ (Love and Compassion), one has to go inwards and receive it from one’s inner Universe. The healing that happens through Preethi Siddhi is permanent because it is coming from the Eternal Source.

Polarity Therapy is a holistic practice which was created in the late 19th century by Dr. Randolph Stone. A mixture of both Eastern and Western energy therapies, Polarity Therapy believes that an electromagnetic energy field surrounds the body and moves between its poles (positive, negative and neutral). The energy centers are based on the Ayurvedic chakras and the Traditional Chinese Medicine principle of yin and yang. Any blockage to the smooth and balanced flow of this energy causes dis-ease in the body. The Human Energy Field is affected by diet, touch, exercise, relationships and life experience. Polarity Therapy works on the principle of balancing these effects through bodywork, touch, exercises, counseling and nutritional advice.

Neuro-Linguistic Programming Therapy (NLP) describes the dynamic between neuro, which is mind, and linguistic which is language and how their conjunction affects one’s body and behavior. It aids one with anger management, stress management, anxiety, pain management and improving performance. The therapists could be effective without even knowing the problem in detail. This typically resolves issues in several brief sessions and tends to be pretty quick with results.

Reconnective Healing is a return to an optimal state of balance. It is the result of interacting with the fully comprehensive reconnective healing spectrum of frequencies that consists of energy, light and information. Its first basic element is energy. Energy is everything we are made up of organically, our very essence and our actual physical body. Light is the resonance and communication within these frequencies between the Universe and humans. It acquaints one with how to discover, access and become aware of one’s relationship with these reconnective healing frequencies.

Switch Words are words that have the ability to switch your energy from one dimension to another. All words contain the power to be switch-words as they get registered in the sub-conscious part of the mind, so that one can even learn to use places, people and things to help them switch from one plane to another. This can become a valuable tool for self-transformation.

Therapy exact name and spelling reqd: Heal your life Program by Louise Hay
Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES_SELF HELP-HEAL YOUR LIFE PROGRAM BY LOUIS HAY.png
Description: Heal Your Life Program by Louise Hay is based on the principles of the book You Can Heal Your Life® by Louise L. Hay. This program is about YOU, the way you are, the key influences and events in your life that have brought you to where you are now and the way you would like your life to be. The process of healing your life begins with breaking through the layers of old conditioning and beliefs about how you “should” lead your life, identifying the problem areas and clearing out emotional clutter connected with them. These programs provide a series of practical steps to make these changes. Some of the benefits of this program are learning to love yourself and others more fully, releasing negative emotions that block your joy and creativity, and working with the body, mind and spirit to transform your life.

The German word ‘gestalt’ means shape or form, referencing the essence of something. Gestalt therapists use experiential techniques to enhance freedom, awareness, and self-direction for the clients. This focuses more on the process than on the content as to what is discussed. Even though it is a person-centered therapy, it emphasises more on the therapist’s use of understanding, empathy and unconditional acceptance of who is sitting in front of them.

Inner Child Work offers a thorough understanding and healing of the child within oneself and opens the floodgates to the bounty of inner being. If there was an overt abuse or neglect in one’s childhood or more subtle pressures and expectations, their psyche continues to bear childhood wounds. Everything one has ever experienced is stored in the body and mind. Events from childhood remain unhealed in most and become major contributors to the conflicts and problems experienced as adults. Inner child work shows how to give one’s Inner Child the nurturing attention it has always needed.

Transactional Analysis is a theory developed by the Psychotherapist Eric Berne who defined the unit for human social interaction as ‘transaction’. When two or more people interact and communicate, verbally or nonverbally, it can offer suggestions and interventions to therapists. This can enable one to change and grow. Transactional Analysis is underpinned by the philosophy that people exist in various states of being that are mutually interactive.

Family Constellation (Trans-generational Healing) is a dynamic therapy to heal an individual from deep underlying family patterns and trauma within their family system. This process involves taking the individual’s issues into a group with the therapist, where others in the group play roles of his/her family members. This process taps into the underlying energy dynamics of the family constellation, thereby opening up new possibilities and improving the relationships dramatically.

Non-violent Communication (NVC) is based on the principles of nonviolence – the natural state of compassion when no violence is present in the heart. NVC begins by believing that we are all-compassionate by nature and that violent strategies, whether verbal or physical, are learned behaviors. People who practice NVC have found greater authenticity in their communication, increased understanding, deepening connection and conflict resolution.

Creative Visualisation is a mental technique that uses the imagination and subtle realms of existence to make dreams and goals a reality. Used in the right way, creative visualisation can improve your life and manifest success and prosperity. It can alter your environment and circumstances by causing events to take place, attracting money, possessions, work, people and love into your life. It is a process that is similar to daydreaming, involving conscious visualisation of the reality you wish to manifest. This demonstrates the natural process and the power of intention, thought and emotion over the laws that materially manifest.

Dolphins can help one receive powerful healing energies due to the high frequency of their own collective consciousness. It is believed that dolphins have incarnated on Earth to help heal the energy of the planet and humans. One doesn’t have to swim with dolphins to receive these healing energies; in fact practitioners who can connect with dolphins can send the energy of dolphins either in person or through a distant healing session. It can be useful to overcome physical, emotional, mental or spiritual challenges.

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES_SELF HELP-AFFIRMATION N VISUALISATION THERAPY.png
Description: Affirmations are amazing tools for taking charge of co-creating our reality and moving beyond our self-limiting beliefs. Affirmations are highly effective in manifesting opportunities and pursuing one’s desires since they are framed in the present tense, positive and rooted in the power of intention. A guided visual journey,using the power of the mind which is coupled with imagination, is a very effective tool for healing.

Sedona Method is a very powerful technique to help ‘let go’ of painful emotions and experiences that hold one back to later become excess emotional baggage. This method consists of asking the patient a series of questions that lead them to what one feels in the moment, and then gently guiding them to let go of that painful emotion or feeling.
Ho’oponopono is a Hawaiian practice of reconciliation and forgiveness based on the principle that things that happen to you or in the world around you are your responsibility. It’s a 4-step process:

Biogenealogy helps in diagnosing and treating effectively the psychic causes of the diseases affecting the patient. It works on the premise that our cells are a store-house of illnesses our ancestors were affected by. Hence the treatment has well-designed and tested methods for going deep, both biologically and emotionally, into the illness in order to find the effective cure.

Hatha Yoga is the authentic form of yoga uncorrupted by modern practices which includes the practice of asana and pranayama, to balance the energies of the individual. This practice is meditative and slow, where one must hold the pose/asana for maximum benefits like flexibility, strength and vitality. The regular practice creates a deep sense of body awareness, feeling of serenity, calm and stillness of the mind.

Vinyasa Yoga is a gradual step-by-step approach that systematically uses the union of breath and movement to create a “flow”. Vinyasa Yoga creates a flow of movement meditation through a specific sequence of asanas that bring the mind, body and soul of the practitioner to balance and harmony.

Ashtanga Yoga as described by Patanjali in the Yoga sutras is the “eight-limbs of Yoga”. This consists of practices that include internal and external purification processes, such as Yamas, Niyama, Asana, Pranayama, Pratyahara, Dharana, Dhyana and Samadhi. This is an all-inclusive way of life as the cleansing is believed to bring one closer to the Universal Self.

Iyengar Yoga is a form of Hatha Yoga masterminded by the great Yogi, B.K.S Iyengar. He made the secrets of the Yoga sutras by Patanjali accessible to the common man. B.K.S. Iyengar greatly emphasized in his teaching the union of body, mind and emotions through regular practice. He designed and developed the use of props such as wooden gadgets, belts and ropes to help the practitioner achieve perfection in any asana.

Kundalini Yoga is a practice originating from the school of Tantra which involves energizing and awakening the dormant cosmic life force, the Kundalini. This energy is awakened by a regular and steady practice of specific asanas, pranayama, meditation and chanting mantras. Kundalini Yoga is only meant for serious seekers who have already undergone some purification in order to be able to contain and hold the energy of the rising Kundalini.

Mudras are the subtle physiological postures adopted by the body to alter the flow of prana (cosmic energy), within the physical body.The use of mudra is a powerful key for linking the material and psychic realms. Mudras sensitize the mind to the experiences of the pranic body. The purpose of the Mudra is to evoke inner forces which otherwise lie dormant in the body and also to access spiritual realms and this is what makes Mudras a powerful tool.

Tibetan Yoga is a Chinese method of controlling your internal energy which is called Qi. Tibetan Yoga is about the movement of the body while using the mind and synchronizing it with breath. It is basically the practice of synchronizing mind, body and breath to create the desired results. Tibetan Yoga gives the practitioner a strong and flexible body, purified energy meridians and clarity of thought through visualisation and mastery of breath.

Kriya Yoga is an ancient yogic practice that enables the practitioners to gain control of their inner energy by regularly practicing kriyas. It involves practicing advanced pranayamas, mantras and mudras to accelerate spiritual development. This tradition is normally taught with an initiation into the mastery of inner energy and the outer world.

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES_READINGS N RITUALS-ANGEL CARD READING.png
Description: Angel Reading is a non-denominational spiritual healing method that involves working with a person’s guardian angels and archangels to heal and harmonize every aspect of their life. Angel therapy also helps one to receive the divine guidance more clearly from the Creator and angels.

In Tarot Card Reading, the therapist uses a pack of picture cards for the individual to choose from.By this method the Tarot Card Reader is able to connect with the present moment to tap into the inner source of all beings. The Reader studies the combination of cards picked by the individual and interprets the messages through their knowledge of symbolism and intuition. This guidance is the language of the Universe with specific relevance to the life of an individual.

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES_READINGS N RITUALS-RUNES GERMANIC ALPHABET.png
Description: Runes are an ancient Germanic alphabet used for writing, divination and magic. They come from an oracle from who one seeks advice and works best if one details their current circumstances and then asks a specific question. This is when the rune caster’s intuition becomes paramount.

According to Numerology, the Universe speaks in the language of numbers that it is not random but one that works through a mathematical approach. Numerologists also believe that each one of us has three numbers that are the most relevant: Psychic Number, Destiny Number and Name Number. They are well-versed in this ancient study which includes the analysis of numbers, patterns, their invisible influence, energetic relevance and their significance in our lives. Numerologists often suggest methods to alter these numbers to help us get rid of karmic blocks and throw open a flow of positive energy.

Cosmic Astrology was established as a science in many different ancient civilizations around the world. Based on this study, the astrologer interprets the influence of stars, planets and other cosmic/ celestial objects on individual lives using the time and location of an individual’s birth, determining their zodiac sun sign, which also signifies the energy under which one’s soul chose to incarnate in this lifetime. There are numerous additional factors influencing overall karmic journey of each soul and by understanding the astrologer’s analysis, one can make an informed decision.

Auras are colorful electromagnetic energy fields that contain information about the energy flow of people, animals and plants at a deeper level. Every aura has many layers including information about your life, connections, changing moods, to deep-set emotions, physical ailments and the areas where the energy flow is obstructed by trapped emotions within the body. An Aura reading can reveal temporary findings that show up as short-term problems and chronic ailments. One can also see the deeper makings of the soul.

Dream Analysis is a method of gaining a deeper understanding of oneself and one’s path in life through an analysis of the symbolism, which is the subconscious material that rises to the conscious mind while we are asleep. Dreams also connect us to the subtler realms of existence and indicate messages from guides, masters or Higher Self or simply give us signs and help uncover our emotions.

Graphotherapy is a means of making conscious alterations in one’s handwriting in order to effect desired subconscious changes in the personality. This is a reversal of the normal writing process, where the hand sends messages to the brain.It seeks to address the root of various ills such as lack of persistence and determination; absence of concentration, frustration and waywardness in material life, including sex; depression; low self-esteem and inability to get over past affairs and failures.

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES_READINGS N RITUALS-ENNEAGRAM OF PERSONALITY.png
Description: Enneagram of Personality is a model of human personality where there are nine interconnected personality types. An Enneagram is a powerful way to understand oneself and the world deeply. Though it is common to find a little bit of oneself in every personality type, the Enneagram lets one choose the one closest to one’s basic personality type. This helps to understand, at each level, the psychological shift that occurs, thereby showing up the personality traits more objectively.

Channeling is the process of communicating with any being that is not in human form by allowing that consciousness to express itself through an individual, the channel. It is a method used to access information, guidance and blessings from entities that are more evolved and could therefore enlighten us as we move through the evolution of consciousness and back to the source.

Shamans are highly evolved spiritual guides with the ability to heal, work with energies, animals’ spirits, spirit of the Mother Earth and have visions. The essential characteristic of shamans is mastery of energy and using fire as a medium for transformation. Shamanism involves the ability to diagnose and cure human suffering by understanding the energy that needs resolve, release and healing. Shamans have been credited with the ability to communicate with the weather, interpretation of dreams, astral projection, and travel to upper and lower worlds.

Ayahuasca is originally an Amazonian plant medicine used by shamans across the upper Amazon throughout Peru, Columbia, Ecuador and Brazil and now also available throughout the world. Ayahuasca is a psychoactive brew made from two plants; it offers access to the realm of spirits and an energetic world that we are typically unable to perceive in our ordinary states of consciousness. This healing ceremony is only conducted by an experienced shaman and enables deep healing through access to otherworldly realms and hidden sub-conscious landscapes.

Candle Magick is the manifestation of one’s deepest desires by tapping into the element of fire. Fire has the ability to exist in the physical realm as well as carry, release and move energy into the subtler etheric realms. In combination with some mantras, fire can tend to be the strongest of all elements in manifesting intentions, completing karmas and releasing energy into the realms beyond. Candle Magick can be used to improve any areas of one’s life: personal growth, professional struggles, relationships and old karma or letting go of energy patterns.

To dowse is to search with the aid of simple hand-held tools or instruments that which is otherwise hidden from view or knowledge. It could be used to search for artifacts and entities, too. Dowsing is most commonly known by people in association with searching for underground water.

Nadi Shastra is a form of Dharma astrology. It is based on the belief that the life of all human beings was predicted by dharma sages during ancient times which was then written on palm leaves, more than thousands of years ago. These writings include recorded facts of one’s life – past, present and future with an explanation of how to cleanse one’s life of past sins by following the prescribed penances and preventive steps.

Animal Communication is a telepathic communication, facilitated by the Therapist, between the pet and its owner. The communication can happen with the pet that has passed, to help their owner cope with their grief and/or guilt. In living pets, this therapy helps to heal and remove energetic blocks that are causing an illness. This method also helps to soothe the animal through discomforting situations such as relocations, behavioural problems and in dire circumstances, to know if the animal wants to be euthanized due to terminal illness or grave injury. Animal communication involves the use of the pet’s photograph for the telepathic healing.

Cartomancy is a form of fortune-telling and the reading is done using a deck of cards. Though Tarot Cards were more popular, from 18th to 20th century playing cards were also used. These cards probably originated in China but gypsy travellers were the ones who spread this method of divination across Europe from 14th century onwards. A standard deck might contain a couple of jokers and even a blank card in addition to the 52-card, four-suit set. Each of these cards signifies a particular meaning and the Reader interprets them based on the order they are chosen.

Akashic Records is an astral library. It acts as a central storehouse for every thought, word, emotion, intent and event felt by every soul since the beginning of Time. The knowledge, in subtle form, exists fluidly between the different realms of time (past, present and possible future) and can be accessed by an Akashic Records Reader through a deep meditative state. The Reader is trained to recognize and draw out the right information based on the seeker’s query. The collective wisdom of the Akashic Records can be tapped into to know one’s soul-purpose and to heal karmic patterns, dis-ease in the body or any mental or emotional pain.

The power of therapeutic gemstones and crystals have been used in Ayurveda, Chinese medicine and Native American Shamanism. Believing that even gems have consciousness, the therapy explores the vast therapeutic possibilities that arise when gemstones are cut into spheres and their energy is systematically applied in specific protocols. This process is a new way to view the entire human organism and the nature of illness.

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES ART THERAPY CATEGORY SYMBOL.png

Description: The Mandala is a circle that represents wholeness, a decorative cosmic diagram reminding one of their relation to infinity, extending beyond and within their body and mind. The vedic texts believe that all the past impressions called ‘samskaras’ are stored in the vital body as symbols. And by meditating upon mandalas, one can awaken those experiences, emotions and memories for healing.

Dance Therapy, also referred to as movement therapy, uses movement of the body to help individuals achieve emotional, cognitive, physical and social integration through release of emotions that could be stored within the body at a muscular and cellular level. This form of expressive therapy explores the relationship between movement and the release of emotion through various forms of dance.

Sufi Whirling is a form of Sama or physically active meditation which originated among Sufis. It emphasizes expressing universal love, peace and a mystical union with the divine through the dancing of whirling dervishes. The spinning and whirling has significance in the expression of energies experienced through this form of self-discovery.

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES ART THERAPY-INTERPLAY DANCE MOVEMENT.png
Description: Interplay is a practice of playful movement, song and story-telling that unlocks body wisdom and takes the participant on a journey, by tapping into parts of the psyche that gets buried over the course of growing up. Interplay is centered on having fun, improvisational, spontaneous and can be practiced in large groups or with individuals. This practice has been proven to decrease stress, anxiety, depression and improve interpersonal relationships while boosting self-confidence and enhancing self-awareness.

Playback Theatre is an improvisational therapy normally performed by a group, in which any person from the group or audience shares their personal story and the rest of the group will re-enact this story on the spot in front on the audience. It creates a learning experience for the person whose story is being enacted. It’s a form of group therapy that is used in schools, universities, organizations, prisons and even hospices as a way to bring people from communities together through healing.

Mind Mapping is a powerful tool to help people illustrate how wounds from their childhood were delivered, stored and how they could be healed. Mind mapping can help people reach the core of their negative belief system. Once they recognize their belief systems, they can see and understand how it affects their whole life. Through mind mapping, one can see the bigger picture and transform deep-seated beliefs into positive ones. It is easy to use and can be done with couples, families, individuals, etc.

Sacred Geometry is the study of intelligent self-organizing principle in the universe that is seen in mathematical and geometrical terms. It is the mathematical pattern that underlies the origin of life in an organic and systematic pattern. By pursuing a deep investigation, many a mysteries of the universe start to unfold. Sacred Geometry is found everywhere in nature: like the inside of an eye resembles a galaxy, the lines on a leaf resemble the branches of a tree and the veins of a human, just as the neurons resemble the birth of stars.

Auto Writing is a form of therapy where a steady stream of subconscious emotions, thoughts and expressions are released through automatic writing. One of the primary goals of auto-writing is to achieve a state of “awareness” through a process of connecting with the source or simply unearthing repressed psychodynamic conflicts for resolution.

Past Life Regression is based on the belief that we carry the memory of all of our lives and experiences deep within our psyches/causal bodies. By using hypnotherapy, the therapist helps the patient to delve deep into their psyche and access past memories from other reincarnations that still affect the individual at a subconscious level. Once this information has been received, the therapist can help the patient complete the healing, at both conscious and subconscious levels.

Hypnobirthing is a unique antenatal program that teaches simple but specific self-hypnosis and relaxation techniques for an easier, more gentle birth that is often accompanied by a significant reduction in pain. It is not about “training mothers to give birth” but about getting rid of the fear and allowing their bodies and minds to relax so they can birth their babies gently. It has been quoted as ‘instinctive birthing’.

Hypnotherapy uses guided relaxation, concentration and focused attention to achieve a heightened state of awareness that occurs at a level of deep relaxation. This hypnotic state allows one to explore painful thoughts, feelings and memories they might have hidden from their conscious minds. In addition, hypnosis enables people to perceive prior experience from a new perspective, enabling immense growth and healing.

Subliminal Therapy is a form of hypnosis where audio-subliminal messages are used to access the subconscious mind of the listener. Old, negative thought-patterns are disrupted and new, healthier thought-processes are introduced to the mind. Subliminal therapy music programs use therapeutic subliminal messages to access the subconscious mind and alter negative thought patterns in order to form a happier and healthier individual.

Life Between Lives (or otherwise known as “life between life” or “LBL”) is the state in which your soul is in-between two lives. It is the period from after your spirit leaves your physical body in the last life to just prior to physical incarnation in this current lifetime. This is a deep hypnotherapy process designed to reconnect with one’s soul and awaken understanding of one’s immortal identity. Some of the benefits include losing the fear of physical death and gaining a complete understanding of who you really are with sum total of your past life, reception of the newly-arrived soul, ways spirits connect with and comfort the living, organization of souls and spiritual advancement in the afterlife, meaning of Hell, spirit guides and angels, selection of a new life, soulmates, purpose of life, the birth process and how one can get assistance in connecting souls with other soul teachers and guides, amongst others.,

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES SOUND HEALING CATEGORY SYMBOL.png

Description: According to the Tibetan oral tradition, the existence of Tibetan singing bowls dates back to the time of the historical Buddha Shakyamuni (560 – 480 B.C.). These bowls produce sounds and vibrations which invoke a deep state of relaxation which thereby naturally assists one in entering into meditation, with the ultimate goal of enlightenment. These are also used for deep relaxation, stress reduction, holistic healing, along with Reiki, and Chakra balancing.

Crystal Bowl Healing is normally conducted using high quality pure crystal bowls. They have been discovered to have incredibly pure sounds and are used for sound healing coupled with the intent and awareness of the healer. The rich, pure, vibrancy of tone helps the listener to relax and achieve deep states of well-being and clarity. It also helps in balancing Chakras and sometimes also induces shamanic journeys to other dimensional states.

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES SOUND THERAPY-VOICE MOVEMENT THERAPY.png
Description: The human voice reflects both physical and psychic states and has the ability to convey cognitive meaning and emotive expression simultaneously. Our voice is our primary mode of communication for both, ideas and feelings and can help us express primal sounds that enable healing. Voice Movement Therapy is used to express emotion through tone which expresses the emotional message underlying what we speak or sing.

The Didgeridoo or Yidaki is an ancient Australian aboriginal instrument. It is a wind instrument, where the player blows air into a long hollow pipe normally made of wood. It was traditionally played during ceremonial and shamanic processes. A didgeridoo is one of the few instruments that produce a sound that is naturally amalgamated and has a direct impact upon the positive functioning of the body and mind. Its deep resonating vibrations can take people into a deep transcendental meditation where they are able to reach Alpha and Delta states.

When one goes against nature, one falls ill. The healing happens only when the disease (toxins) is expelled from the body. Naturopathy cures diseases without the use of any medicines. Instead, it involves earth and nature to bring a balance into one’s body, which again is composed of the 5 elements. Naturopathy empowers the human body to heal itself by working on the immune system in the fuller sense of both, the physical and the psyche, which is responsible for one’s overall health and wellness.

Ayurveda is the science of life and was developed thousands of years ago. It was believed that the Gods passed down this knowledge to humans. One of the main principles of Ayurveda is that the body and mind are inextricably connected and that when the mind is brought into balance, it has immense healing power as that balance extends to the body. It is a method of healing the body from illnesses by using a combination of treatments that include detoxification, cleansing, massage, dietary control, herbal medicines, communion with nature, and exercise.

Homeopathy is a gentle and effective medicinal science that was developed in Germany. It does not treat superficially at the symptomatic level but heals the patient at the root level. The medicine is in the form of sugar pills that are infused with dilutions that contain the essence of natural substances treated with specific amount of vibration. It is scientific and works on the principles of quantum physics. This safe, quick and extremely effective method of healing offers long lasting to permanent cure, treating the disease from its roots, for most of the ailments.

Bach Flower Remedies uses 38 different flower essences distilled in water with the help of sun exposure or boiling. A special tincture is developed using these flowers which when taken orally can restore the internal balance and harmony between the mind, body and soul. This facilitates the natural healing abilities of the body to transform negative emotions while bringing about a sense of happiness and peace of mind.

Tridosha Therapy is an Ayurvedic study of human nature & bodily constitution through a combination of these elements: Vata – Air and Ether element, Pitta – Fire and Water element, Kapha – Water and Earth Element. Ayurvedic doctors understand and interpret how these elements interact with the individual and their environment. Based on this assessment, suitable treatment is recommended to bring about good health and a balance of body, mind and soul.

Panchkarma is a process developed by the study of Ayurveda for detoxification and purification through 5 therapies along with special detoxification diet. The combination of these therapies cleanses the body of its toxins in various ways, uses herbal medicines and oils as a method for healing and preventive therapy, which can also purify the mind, body and soul.

Chinese/ Tibetan Medicine -Tibetan medicine combines principles of Ayurveda and the natural bounty of the Himalayas with the philosophical and spiritual beliefs of the Buddhist faith.It is based on 5 elements: Earth, Water,Fire, Air and Space. The treatment includes medicines composed of natural minerals and herbs as well as physical therapies such as Tibetan acupuncture and moxibustion. It helps to cure nervous issue,digestive disorders, heartburn, back pain, asthma, arthritis, eczema, sinusitis, liver problems/disorders, kidney problems/disorders, circulation issues, anxiety, sleep disorders, high blood pressure, stress and tension, allergic skin reactions, sexual dysfunction, overall health and vitality.

Aromatherapy uses natural fragrant oils extracted from herbs, flowers, fruits, barks, stems, leaves, roots and other parts of a plant to enhance psychological, spiritual and physical well-being. The inhaled aroma from these “essential” oils is widely believed to stimulate brain functions, relax the neurological synapses as well as tap into memory. Essential oils can also be absorbed through the skin from where they travel through the bloodstream and promote whole-body healing.

Salt Therapy is a natural and non-invasive therapy that helps relieve the symptoms of a wide range of respiratory and skin conditions. Salt has the ability to cleanse and heal the energy body of negativity and auric dust it accumulates from stressful circumstances. It is a natural anti-inflammatory, antibacterial and antihistamine, so people experiencing everything from asthma to eczema can expect significant and lasting relief with regular salt therapy.

Reflexology is the application of appropriate pressure to specific points and areas on the feet, hands, or ears. It believes that these areas and reflex points correspond to different body organs and systems, and that pressing them has a beneficial effect on the organs and the person’s general health. For example, reflexology holds that a specific spot in the arch of the foot corresponds to the bladder point. When a reflexology practitioner uses thumbs or fingers to apply appropriate pressure to this area, it affects the bladder functioning.

Bowen Therapy is a dynamic system of muscle and connective tissue therapy. It utilizes subtle inputs to the body known as moves, stimulating the body to heal itself, often profoundly. The practitioner’s moves deliver signals to the nervous system at specific locations (on muscles, tendons, ligaments, or nerves), and the body responds in its own time, within its vital capacity. It provides relief for many types of injuries and health problems, both acute and chronic, and is appropriate for people of all ages, in all degrees of health.

EFT – Emotional Freedom Technique originated from the ancient Chinese study of Chi and the paths of energy flow. It helps to transform physical or emotional issues by tapping on the meridian points with fingertips along with a specific affirmation. It relaxes the mind and balances the body.

Tai Chi is an ancient Chinese tradition that is practiced as a graceful form of mindful exercise to stimulate the movement of Chi in the energy system. It involves a series of movements performed in a slow, meditative manner and accompanied by deep breathing. Also called Tai Chi Chuan, it is a non-competitive, self-paced system of gentle physical exercise and stretching. Each posture flows into the next without a pause, ensuring that the body is in constant motion.

Rubenfeld Synergy is an integrative somatic therapy which uses compassion and understanding towards the body and oneself. Through this connectedness it calms the nervous system after which the body, mind and spirit come into harmony. This method works by paying attention and listening to the intelligence of the body, bringing self-awareness, relief and transformation.

Rolfing is a system of soft tissue manipulation and movement education that organizes the whole body in congruence with the forces of gravity. Rolfing bodywork affects the body’s posture and structure by manipulating the myofascial system (connective tissue). Often considered a deep-tissue approach, Rolfing bodywork actually works with all the layers of the body to ease strain patterns in the entire system. This system of treatment has been shown to significantly reduce chronic stress, spinal curvature in subjects with lordosis (sway back), and to enhance neurological functioning.

Somatic Experience aims at relieving the symptoms of emotional or mental trauma which are stored in the physical body and eventually turn into disease. A somatic experience includes tracking one’s bodily sensations and experience in a deep state of focused awareness. Other techniques used in this experience are breathing, movement and healing touch. Somatic experience helps patients become aware of the emotional blocks stored in their body and how it can awaken its intelligence to the conscious self.

Physiotherapy is a form of treatment that focuses on the science of movement and helps people to restore and/or maintain their physical strength, function, motion and overall well-being by addressing the underlying physical issues. Some of the techniques include Joint mobilisation (gentle gliding) techniques, Joint manipulation, Physiotherapy Instrument Mobilisation (PIM),Minimal Energy Techniques (METs), Muscle stretching, Neurodynamics, Massage and soft tissue techniques,Acupuncture and Dry Needling,Physiotherapy Taping. Benefits include preventing injury and disability; managing acute and chronic conditions, improving and maintaining optimal physical performance, rehabilitating injury and the effects of disease or disability and educating patients to prevent the re-occurrence of an injury.

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES_ALTERNATIVE THERAPIES-NAMBUDRIPAD ALLERGY ELIMINATION TECHNIQUE.png
Description: Nambudripad’s Allergy Elimination Technique (NAET) was discovered by Dr. Devi S. Nambudripad in November of 1983. It is a non-invasive, drug free, natural solution to alleviate allergies of all types and intensities using a blend of selective energy balancing, testing and treatment procedures from acupuncture/acupressure, allopathy, chiropractic, nutritional, and kinesiology disciplines of medicine.

Nadi Therapy is an ancient therapy where a practitioner can reveal the past, present and future ailments along with the root cause of the individual’s ailments by merely checking the pulse. This therapy can be a preventive cure often alerting patients of major illnesses before the symptoms show up, allowing intervention and cures, from simple to chronic issues.

The different frequencies of light have a profound and healing effect on all creation. Colour Therapy aims to balance and enhance the body’s vital energy centres and chakras by using the invisible colours of the light spectrum. Colour Therapy can be used to solve any problem: physical, mental, emotional or spiritual. It is also an overall relaxation therapy.

Acupressure is an ancient healing therapy that uses the finger to apply gentle to firm pressure on key healing points that correspond with energy meridians throughout the body. This helps stimulate the body’s natural life force and self-healing abilities. This therapy releases muscular tension and is also effective in stress-related ailments. It increases circulation, reduces pain, enhances vibrancy of health and boosts the immune system.

Acupuncture comes from an ancient Chinese form of Energy Therapy that works by inserting very thin needles into the patient’s skin at specific points on the body. This practice corresponds to the nervous system and stimulates the flow of Chi at various depths, and gives benefits such as release of pain management, tension and energetic blocks and also aiding the body in healing itself from chronic ailments.

Shiatsu originated in Japan from traditional Chinese medicine.Shiatsu means ‘finger pressure’ where a practitioner uses touch, comfortable pressure and manipulative techniques to adjust the body’s physical structure and balance its energy flow. It is a deeply relaxing experience and regular treatments can alleviate stress and illness.

Massage Therapy is a manual massage of soft body tissues to enhance and relax the muscles, which in turn leads to the relaxation of the mind. A massage therapist is trained with a deep understanding of human anatomy and how sensations and touch can stimulate healing. It is used to reduce stress and anxiety, relax muscles, rehabilitate injuries, and reduce depression and chronic pain while promoting overall health and a sense of wellbeing.

Thai Massage (Nuad Bo-Rarn) is a mixture of Acupressure, Yoga and Zen Shiatsu which is inspired by the Buddhist teachings of energy flow. It applies pressure on various body parts by the practitioner using the palms of the hands, thumbs, elbows, and feet without the use of oil or lotion. Thai Massage offers deep relaxation, reduction in stress levels, improved overall circulation and increased energy levels.

Lomi Lomi is a Hawaiian massage which basically means to rub or soothe. It involves the use of body strokes and techniques which can make it a very sensual experience for the client. The therapist treats the client’s body as sacred which allows the client to relax completely without the judgment of the therapist. The technique reduces physical stress and relaxes tense muscles.

Chi Nei Tsang is a combination of Thai and Chinese healing massages with meditation techniques which only focus on the navel area (“center of the body”) as it believes that this is the primary area where imbalance first occurs. This therapy is quite helpful for children suffering from stomach ache. It detoxifies the body, reduces stress and anxiety and releases negative emotions.

Ana Pana Sati Meditation is a simple breath meditation in which the doer is only asked to observe the natural breath and become one with it. Ana-Pana means inhalation and exhalation, and Sati is Mindfulness. Healing and enlightenment can be achieved through this meditation, along with finding pleasure in stillness.

Mindfulness is the art and science of finding focus and stability in one’s daily life. Mindfulness helps individuals become aware of and experience the present moment and empowers them with response-ability. Being mindful in every action or being present in every moment can help one connect with one’s true nature, which is simply ‘being’. Most people live either in regret of the past or worry of the future but the past and future are both like dreams, so becoming mindful roots one in the present ‘Now’ moment. Doing this opens up the universe of opportunities to make the most of one’s life and find meaning and happiness.

Osho Dynamic Meditation was founded by Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh Osho, better known as just “Osho”. In this meditation, one has to be completely conscious, alert and continuously aware of every action. It is a specific technique that lasts for an hour, including a sequence of 5 steps: breathing, catharsis (expressing yourself in whichever way you find comfortable), chanting the mantra ‘Hoo’, being still and celebrating in the form of dance. The meditation provides benefits of inner peace, silence, better attention, concentration, calming influence, stress management and freedom from addiction.

Meditation is a state of thoughtless awareness, not an action but a state of being. It is a state of profound deep peace that occurs when the mind is calm and silent, yet completely alert. A regular practice of meditation can take one to higher levels of self-awareness and peace along with increased cognitive functions, lower anxiety and stress levels.

The late Maharishi Mahesh Yogi revived the practice of Transcendental Meditation originating in the ancient Vedic tradition in India and brought it to the West. It is a form of meditation which involves the chanting of a mantra for 20 minutes, twice a day. It helps to reach deeper states of inner peace, calm, blissfulness, and experience the ‘self’ as pure consciousness. Taught by qualified teachers and practiced regularly it completely changes the quality of one’s experience of life.

Vipassana Meditation was rediscovered by Gautama Buddha more than 2500 years ago. In this practice, one goes into complete silence for a minimum of 10 days. Being in this silence takes you within to observe yourself and face your emotions. This conscious awareness and presence dissolves the emotions. In the 10-day Vipassana program there is no speaking and is referred to as the ‘noble silence’.

Zen Buddhism is a school of Mahayana Buddhism where the core practice is meditation, emphasizing mindfulness and intuition. It is a journey of self-discovery and living in the moment. Zen Buddhism helps one find wisdom and Universal truths experientially rather than through beliefs and rituals.

Progressive Relaxation Technique was invented in 1929 by Dr. Edmund Jacobson. The therapist guides the patient to tighten and relax specific muscle groups in a sequence. By paying attention to specific areas and muscle groups, one is able to become more aware of the body and in tune with its intelligence and physical sensations.It helps relax the body and mind and deal with anxiety issues.

Angelic Chanting is a way of invoking a Higher Power like the angels and archangels for assistance, guidance, support or simply blessings. Everybody’s angels try to communicate with them through many ways. Many spiritual masters can also channel and communicate with angels, receive their messages and also teach others to directly communicate with them. Angelic chanting is a mantra, a sound-based incantation that invokes their energy and opens the heart chakra by radiating love & compassion.

ALFA HRV Analyzer assesses the wellness of the internal regulatory systems such as the cardiac, hormonal, neurological and psycho-emotional systems based on Heart Rate Variability (HRV). ALFA, a system based on measuring the pulse variability synchronised with the Heart Rate Variability (HRV) has a direct connection to the nervous system, by the sinus node. Frequencies from the HRV are shown as ECG and RR-intervals. Measuring the pulse provides an image of the body’s various divisions over the spectrum as well as the synchronization of each division with each other.

ES Complex is an FDA- approved, non-invasive testing device used for the evaluation of the autonomic nervous system, organ functions and risk factors associated with heart disease, diabetes and stroke. It screens the tissue pathophysiologic process occurring inside the body and also provides information about the Autonomous Nervous System (ANS), Parasympathetic and Sympathetic System Activity, and the Digestive, Respiratory and Hormonal systems.

Biofield Reader uses photographic filters to read auras. There are many layers to an aura: the outer layers indicate moods, emotions and thoughts and can change from moment to moment whereas the deeper layers of the aura do not change momentarily and indicate most deeply ingrained emotional and energetic issues. It filters gradations and light that cannot be seen by the naked eye, gives information on a person’s general energy levels and any imbalances and blocks, along with offering Live Aura Streaming.

Resonant Field Imaging (RFI) evaluates the aura or biofield of a body using electromagnetic feedback. RFI involves the use of small electronic devices that consist of a small chip and an antenna. The chip is capable of carrying around 2000 bytes of data. The RFID device serves the same purpose as a bar code or a magnetic strip on the back of an ATM card – it provides a unique identifier for that object. And, just as a barcode or magnetic strip must be scanned to get the information, the RFID device scans the body to retrieve identifying information such as Aura and Chakra Analysis, Brainwave Analysis, Organ level analysis, Vaastu (Objects and Spaces) Analysis and Botanical Analysis (Plants and Trees). It also finds much use in studying the behaviour of animals and in paranormal investigations.

Quantum Resonance Magnetic Health Analyser (QRMHA) tracks the optimal functioning of the body’s major systems, organs and glands based on sensing electromagnetic signals from the body. A sensor rod held in the hand of the patient collects data on various systems of the body using electrical impulses via “skin conductance”. Health data of 23 parameters is collected within minutes from various body systems. QRMHA replaces the need for ultrasonic, nuclear magnetic resonance or radiography for various health related conditions. Mostly recommended for Primary or Preventive Healthcare.

The Universe consists of five elements. The human body too is connected with these five elements of nature. The colour of every cycle and aura represents a particular element that we are unable to understand or see with the naked eye. With the help of a Biowell GDV camera the movement of the 7 cycles of our body can be understood by analysing the pictures of the tips of our five fingers. This provides a full body analysis and a prognosis of present and future health problems. One can see the aura in real time. The holistic healer applying Kirlian photography can get pre and post reports after treatment.

Electro Reflex Energizer activates the energy centers on the feet, based on the study of reflexology. It includes, but is not limited to, relieving stress and tension, improving blood supply, promoting the unblocking of nerve impulses, and helping the body achieve homeostasis. It is also used to manage the energy balance in the body and the physical and emotional detoxification and this in turn helps in building greater body awareness.

Unconsciously, we acquire many toxins into our physical body via the pollution in our environment, electromagnetic radiation, food & water, on a daily basis. Foot Detox aids in detoxification by throwing away the chemical toxins accumulated inside the body.

Far Infrared Sauna is an effective tool for natural healing & prevention. It has the ability to penetrate human tissues thereby producing a host of anti ageing health benefits. This makes infrared saunas one of the most effective therapies for an overall healthier living in today’s world.

I – Float relaxes the muscles and releases tension by allowing the user to experience a zero-gravity state. The healing takes place at a deep level of relaxation and involves the subtle aligning of the spine and de-stressing of the back muscles. The intelligent use of light and sound offers the patient deep tissue healing, and a meditative experience by helping them experience alpha & theta brainwave states.

The Bio Tuner by SOTA is an easy-to-use relaxation product for stress relief and balancing the body’s energies. It outputs harmonic frequencies to promote health. This unit features an automatic built-in timer for 20-minute sessions.

Silver Pulsar uses gentle micro currents of electricity to stimulate the body’s immune system to generate more energy in order to promote good health. It also produces ionic colloidal silver to make germ-fighting water.

Scenar Cosmodic Ex735Ag is a self-controlled Energy Neural Adaptive Regulator device. It works on neurological signal pathways that aren’t functioning optimally. It actively participates with the brain in establishing corrective healing patterns by establishing a two-way communication with the brain to help it correct the erratic holding pattern and trigger another system in the body to send the rebalancing chemicals and hormones. In this way it helps to restore lost bodily functions and trigger tissue regeneration. It is also used as a device to slow down ageing.

QLaser Q1000NG is a Light & Frequency medicine for deep tissue activation. The resonating low level lasers combine the therapeutic effect of light and frequency medicine for pain relief at deeper levels. The FDA has also confirmed the efficiency of Q1000NG in the treatment of osteoarthritis of the hand.

Magnetic Pulser is a small device designed to treat physiological and neurological disorders, and works on muscular relaxation. Bio magnetic impulses are used to restore the body to its original state of health. It can be used anywhere on the body.
NeuroSky Mind Wave & Mind Workstation uses dry EEG sensors to measure and monitor brain wave states in real-time. It is also capable of brainwave entrainment using bio-feedback optimization.

HeartMath emWave PRO improves wellness and facilitates personal growth by changing one’s heart rhythm pattern to create coherence. It uses ‘Biofeedback’ to collect data from a sensor attached to the earlobe to measure Heart Rate Variability (HRV). emWave technology collects pulse data and translates the information from one’s heart rhythms into graphics on the computer. It is a scientifically measurable state characterized by increased order and harmony in one’s psychological and physiological processes.

BrainTap Mind Machine uses “brainwave entrainment” which, through the use of sound waves, changes the brain wave pattern and activates its peak potential. It ‘reboots’ the brain by cleaning the slate of the unimportant and teaches how to reinforce the most valuable information for better memory and brain power, thereby also giving it the endurance to handle extreme stress.

Emotiv EPOC+ is a 14 channel wireless EEG, designed for contextualized research and advanced brain computer interface (BCI) applications. The EPOC+ provides access to dense array, high quality, raw EEG data, using the subscription-based software. It can be used to measure levels of meditation, focus and neurological health.
Mindfold Relaxation Mask simulates a zero-light environment that is ideal for relaxation and meditation.

SE-5 1000 is a product of Subtle Energy Research based on the concepts of Radionics and Biofield theory where SE-5 works through the IDFs (Intrinsic Data Field) that contain biofield information, like a microfilm, about how energy is organized and structured into matter. The SE-5 is designed to detect and balance these biofields with precision and accuracy through the use of Scalar Energy vibrations.

Acmos Method is a special therapy for balancing the patient’s energy fields using a combination of traditional Chinese wisdom and scientific discoveries made in the field of modern molecular biology. The most important tool of Acmos Method is Acmos Lecher Antenna. It strengthens the body energetically and helps to cope with aggression, corrects the disturbances in the body’s energy field before they develop into illnesses and identifies deep physical or emotional energy blockages.

TimeWaver uses the possibilities of Information Field technology in the shape of high-class medical devices. They can explore the background and correlations of various diseases found in the information field, and then positively influence them in that very same information field. Moreover, the power of minimal electrical currents and frequencies can be used with an aim to directly treat the cells and physical body.

Therapy exact name and spelling reqd: Testing Equipment for aiding research activity

Parent Therapy: Testing Equipment for aiding research activity
Description: Air Ion Counter measures Air Ion density – number of positive and negative ions in the air. It can also help assess radioactivity levels in the environment. Air purity in an area as well as changes due to any external event can be determined with this device.

Parent Therapy: Testing Equipment for aiding research activity
Description: Trifield Natural EM Meter measures electromagnetic levels in the environment and can also measure radio and microwave energy levels in any space.

Parent Therapy: Testing Equipment for aiding research activity
Description: COM-100 is a waterproof EC / TDS / Temp Combo Meter which measures electrical conductivity (EC), total dissolved solids (TDS), salinity and temperature.

Rebirthing is a gentle yet conscious breathing technique that not only brings into conscious awareness the unconsciously held beliefs and emotions but also the relationships we have with our bodies, ourselves and our intimates. On practicing this conscious breathing, it becomes possible to resolve, integrate and heal previously unresolved issues within ourselves, filling us with more joy and allowing us to reach our true potential as human beings.

Pranayama is the ancient yogic practice of controlling the mind using breath through conscious breathing exercises. Pranayama also balances the prana in the right and left hemispheres of the body and cleanses the nadis of blocks to stimulate a smoother flow of energy. The yogis taught that the mind and breath are intimately connected; our state of mind affects our breathing and similarly breathing can help change one’s state of mind. And so by mastering the breath one can gain mastery of the mind.

Sudarshan Kriya is a unique, powerful technique of breathing in a rhythmic pattern. These breathing techniques bring one completely into the present moment, harmonizing mind, body and emotions. It aids in eliminating stress, fatigue and negative emotions such as anger, frustration and depression leaving one calm yet energized, focused and yet relaxed.

Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT) is a form of counseling that can help us manage our problems by becoming consciously aware of our patterns and what causes them, thereby changing the way we think and behave. CBT is based on the idea that thoughts, emotions, physical sensations, behaviours and actions are all interconnected. And that by consciously changing a single component of this vicious cycle, all aspects can be improved for a better life. It is most commonly used to treat anxiety and depression, but can be useful for other mental and physical health problems as well.

Rational Emotive Behavioural Therapy is an active-directive, solution-oriented therapy that is focused on resolving emotional, cognitive and behavioural problems in individuals. Rational Emotive Behavioural Therapy teaches us to identify, evaluate, dispute, and act against one’s own irrational self- defeating beliefs through the use of reason.

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES_COUNSELING AND CONSULTING CATEGORY SYMBOL.png
Description: Step 1: Repentance – I’M SORRYStep 2: Ask Forgiveness – PLEASE FORGIVE ME. Step 3: Gratitude – THANK YOU. Step 4: Love – I LOVE YOU!

It helps to release bad memories, cope with negative feeling, gain control on your action and thoughts, recognize your inner strength, reduce stress levels and increase the level of happiness one experiences.

Image: THRIIVE MODALITIES_COUNSELING AND CONSULTING-CONSCIOUS PARENTING COUNSELOR.png
Description: Conscious Parenting Counselor sets certain beliefs in parents about what children needs to develop.The counselor helps parents to engage and connect with their children using emotionally intelligent discipline choices rather than harsh methods. The therapy supports the bond between parent and child,gives the right to the child to express his feeling, allows a child to grow as he needs to and promotes family harmony.

Sex therapy helps individuals overcome physical, psychological and sexual issues. With the help of sex therapy, which can either be done individually or with one’s partner, one can overcome concerns about sexual functions,sexual feelings and intimacy. Sex therapists tend to have a greater knowledge of the psychological elements which are a part of human sexuality that helps in addressing the entirety of sexual concerns.

Marriage Counselor helps people with relationship problems. He/she can help the couple to work through conflicts and communication gaps and discover various ways to deal with the problem that might arise in the future. A marriage counselor helps reduce the divorce rate, promotes healthy relationships and helps avoid future major problems.

A Spiritual Counselor helps the patient to deal with pain, grief,trauma and major difficult decisions keeping the patient’s spiritual growth in mind.The counselor combines spirituality with science while dealing with the client’s problems. By means of this process, the individual quietens the thoughts that are disturbing, finds an alternate way of looking at a situation, gets power from within, and gets the courage to face a problem rather than react to it.

A Nutritionist advises on food and nutrition which impacts one’s health. Well-maintained nutrition is important for healthy living and an overall well-being. A nutritionist develops meal goals, educates on portion control and provides special diets for the treatment and prevention of chronic ailments such as diabetes, heart diseases, etc.

Life Coaching changes the way clients operate at a deeper level. It does not stop at just examining behaviours, habits and goals. Life Coaching facilitates the clients to delve into their deep-rooted beliefs and thought patterns. It also helps them to connect within with their supreme power (Core of Existence). This enables the clients to become aware of their resourcefulness and to be their ‘authentic self’. By doing this, the clients are empowered to adopt new behaviours and take their performance to the next level, thereby functioning from their highest state of abundance.
